subject: CBSNews.com News Alert! Pat Tillman's Brother Criticizes Military Version Of Football Star's Death
body:
At a congressional hearing, the brother of football star Pat Tillman said 
the story given to them by the military about his death was "pure fiction."

Log on now to www.cbsnews.com, or wap.cbsnews.com for wireless users, for details.
